item.title: I make crochet tops!
item.description:
Do I make crochet items? Yes is this one mine? No. This is actually a bait and switch because I need your freaking help. I have met the crossroads where need outweighs embarrassment. I have been out of work for 1.5 years. It's a miracle I've made my finances last this long. I sold my car and bought something cheap and old months ago just so I could keep paying our bills. I have been on job boards applying every single day. I've had 70 applications on Indeed alone in the last 2 months, that doesn't even include other job boards like Connecting Colorado or LinkedIn, or direct applications. I have excellent references and only lost my previous employment due to a company-wide layoff. I have made it into the final interview stage a depressing number of times (including at the state level) and I honestly do not understand why I cannot find employment. I have asked for feedback and each time it's the same. They think I'm great and it was a really difficult choice but they went with the other candidate. I NEED a job desperately at this point. I have tried applying for lower-paying jobs so that I could get by until I land back on my feet but I am either over-qualified and they would not hire me or something else but I couldn't even get hired as ahouse cleaner. I am at the point where I need to be back in a good-paying job or I am going to drown and lose everything. I have a 10 yr old daughter I have sole custody of and I have ONE month left of bill money. I told her a few weeks ago that I am her Santa because we cannot afford Christmas. We cannot afford anything. Food Stamps are the only thing that has given me enough slack to keep paying my bills. I've used my savings, I've emptied my retirement accounts, I sold my reliable car... I got professional help on interviewing and resume building and I don't have anything left to try except to ask the public for help because I am drowning like I have never before in my life and I am really BEGGING at this point for someone to please give me a chance. I am intelligent, hard-working, and dedicated. Please I am not asking for a handout. I just need a good job. I will train to do literally anything. Just give me a chance.
GBMaker asked me to make a paypal pool and link it here. Thank you to anyone who decides to help me out. Every little bit is truly appreciated. That being said I really am after a job. I've always supported myself and am anxious to be back on my feet. In the meantime, I am grateful for you all. For every view and share and comment that may get me closer to that goal. And to those who are so kind to share a bit of what they've earned with me to lighten my load. Thank you. https://www.paypal.com/pool/9kmXNsMnuI?sr=wccr And here is my daughter's wishlist for Christmas https://www.amazon.com/registries/gl/guest-view/OE1J6CH8D2KY?ref_=cm_sw_r_apann_ggr-subnav-share_95HP1HCWHXTT6GT6F0AW&language=en-US Edit: you guys I could cry this morning. You bought everything on my daughter's wishlist and you've donated $650. I am so grateful to each and every one of you beautiful souls. I am touched beyonds words. I haven’t had a chance to read everyone's comments and massages yet, but I promise ill read them all and respond. Thank you!

item.title: Return of the Meme: 1537²: Trilateral Suspension Feeder
item.description:
Let's get this bread. Someday, I will remember to count again. Lol.
Learned that the place where I was printing the labels I make for my meads is shutting down. Which is sad, but considering I was debating hanging up my hat from the hobby after this Basswood mead I'm making was done... I guess it's a sign it's time.
And now you know.
Oof.
Work has an espresso machine in the office and I will put espresso in my coffee.
Me, to the person I'm currently flirting at.
I think that those arteries allow for those places to be erotic, but it's only a working hypothesis at this point.
Oh no! War crimes!
Put your hands up, mothercluckers.
The wildest thing about Nanotyrranus to me is that it seems more closely related to tyrannosaurs from Appalachia than other parts of Laramidia.
And my second alarm went off: the White-crowned Sparrows start to sing like clockwork at 6:55 AM
Fall is gone, I think.
The flowers may or may not have been intrusive thanks to burrowing mammals, but the rest of this still stands, and someday I will get my arse in gear and write that short story based on the dream I had about him.
Yeah.
Whether or not you believe Jesus was divine, one fact remains: he'd be pissed about this.
Pippin, having eyes, is running back and forth inside my shirt muttering all sorts of things. I can only understand some of the words, but most adorably, he said "I'm sorry, i'm sorry," after he bit my nipple.
I have yet to see an American Bittern. I saw Least Bitterns when I was in New Mexico, but never these weirdos.
The "Male Lonliness Epidemic" is largely because most men have been radicalized into their behaviors and thoughts. I may not be dating, but there is *absolutely* no shortage of powerful, amazing women in my life I'm honored to be friends with. I am alone, but not lonely.
False Knees is right, gulls have no weak spots.
This Sparrow Knows the ancestors.
I would have loved being a Trilaterally Symetrical Suspension Feeder, but nooooo, now I have to do ????????????? all day. Goddammit, Cambrian Explosion.
Pippin tax! Today's message from Pippin (which you can hear on our discord): [whispered] "Fuck you." ______ 1) Are you on the run to a safe place and passing through Arizona on your way to safer grounds? My apartment is open to you to crash at, and it is a safe space. Pippin and I will make you a meal and gladly share tea, wine, or mead with you. 2) Hey! Take your meds with a full glass of water, please. Do it for Pippin, or Space Mom, or better yet, do it for yourself. 3) Ĝefeloað wē. We will carry on. 4) all funds from the sales of items at these two links will be sent to support charities aiding to fight for Trans rights in the US (not just T-shirts!) https://www.teepublic.com/t-shirt/74812801-all-conures-are-anarchists https://www.teepublic.com/t-shirt/74811778-whiptail-pride 5) Since multiple people have requested this over the last two weeks or so, my ko-fi is: https://ko-fi.com/codyandpippin 6) We have a discord: https://discord.gg/qadbfR9A
item.dc:creator: CodyBurkett

item.title: Progress update time?
item.description: Another update on my progress since breaking my lower body and spine November 10th 2020! As usual I ask for kindness and understanding on my weight because I'm very vulnerable when I make these posts. While I was bedridden for 2.5 years letting my left leg heal, I gained a lot but it is coming off But back to the update.... I took my FIRST completely unsupported step in 5 years! It was messy and wobbly but definitely a step! A year ago I couldn't even shuffle my left leg forward while standing and holding on! I also now walk into and out of the YMCA pool twice a week by myself, and do chair yoga with some standing poses twice a week! Before this video, I had managed a wall sit in class. I say this to say... don't give up. They told me I'd never stand or walk again and now I just took a step independently. As always, I love you all, you beautiful Internet strangers. You are worthy. You are seen. You are beautiful. You CAN keep going. Keep fighting. And to those who live in the states, happy early Thanksgiving!

item.title: Whatever these monks were smoking, I want some.
item.description:
Initials from the Chansonnier de Zeghere van Male. Ornately illuminated with initials and miniatures that have little relevance to the music, the Chansonnier is a manuscript of songs collected in 1542 by the bourgeois Zeghere Van Male of Bruges. Municipal Library of Cambrai, France
#illuminations #opium_dream

item.title: The 'Inca princess' was found high in the Andes, preserved for centuries by freezing temperatures, dry air, and low oxygen. Buried during the capacocha ritual, she remains one of the best-preserved mummies, offering rare insight into Inca culture.

item.title: GovBrief Today #299
item.description: They make up rules, punish the resisters, and defy the courts. Then a damning tape leaks. Trump's real estate buddy Steve Witkoff is on tape coaching Putin's foreign policy adviser on how to pitch the president. "Maybe he says to President Trump..." He's literally scripting Russia's approach. Trump called it "standard negotiation." Meanwhile, Senator Mark Kelly faces FBI counterterrorism investigators AND the threat of court-martial for reminding troops they can refuse illegal orders. The Pentagon is threatening to recall a retired Navy captain and former astronaut because he cited U.S. law. And DOJ admitted today that Kristi Noem ordered deportations to proceed despite a federal judge's order. The judge already found officials "likely engaged in criminal contempt." They're not hiding it. They just don't think you're paying attention. Talk with your friends and loved ones tomorrow, but not about the culture war. Share your feelings about the hungry kids, the sick people who can't afford insurance, and the seniors who depend on Medicare and Social Security. Want to stop missing what matters? Get every brief in your inbox, 7 nights a week. You'll get data, images, quotes, and links to help you get engaged. Sign up free at govbrief.today. #GovBriefToday #Resist Subscribe (It's Free!) - https://gbounacos.substack.com [1] https://go.govbrief.today/trump-witkoff-russia-coaching [2] https://go.govbrief.today/ukraine-russia-witkoff-plan [3] https://go.govbrief.today/vaccine-skeptic-cdc [4] https://go.govbrief.today/medicare-drug-prices-2026 [5] https://go.govbrief.today/national-parks-price-increase [6] https://go.govbrief.today/consultant-defies-court [7] https://go.govbrief.today/wisconsin-redistricting-panels [8] https://go.govbrief.today/pentagon-scouting [9] https://go.govbrief.today/hegseth-kelly-deadline [10] https://go.govbrief.today/justice-dept-complaint-dismissed [11] https://go.govbrief.today/epstein-judge-orders-expeditious [12] https://go.govbrief.today/swalwell-sues-pulte [13] https://go.govbrief.today/san-pedro-prison-suspended [14] https://go.govbrief.today/noem-deportation-principal [15] https://go.govbrief.today/colorado-ice-unlawful-arrests [16] https://go.govbrief.today/border-agents-arizona-crash [17] https://go.govbrief.today/ok-professor-arrested-ice [18] https://go.govbrief.today/fairfax-antisemitism-probe [19] https://go.govbrief.today/fbi-trump-democrats-probe [20] https://go.govbrief.today/senate-auto-safety [21] https://go.govbrief.today/trump-fbi-patel-ouster [22] https://go.govbrief.today/public-defender-lawsuit-kirk Subscribe (It's Free!) - https://gbounacos.substack.com
